subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The hardcourts at the California tournament must feel like clay to Rafael Nadal, who advanced to the title match of the BNP Paribas Open for the fourth time.
snippet: The hardcourts at the California tournament must feel like clay to Rafael Nadal, who advanced to the title match of the BNP Paribas Open for the fourth time.
